### addRange() {#aa71b518026ce2113a8281f7dd3f050d9}

<MemberDefinition

Add a new store to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges">MemsetRanges</a> data structure.

This adds a new range for the specified store at the specified offset, merging into existing ranges as appropriate.
